title: I can't connect chat.

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: What should I do? My Client is stuck in logging onto the chat forever. Is there any solutions? I've tried restarting my computer which by the way didn't help. I then later want to  http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/XbtWxfhp-cant-connect-to-chat-at-login but that didn't help at all probably because it is outdated. Is there a way to fix this besides redownloading the game?

replies.body: We've received a few reports on this, and some players are not able to connect to chat.  I don't have an eta or more information on this just now. You can also go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in the meantime, in case it can help your specific issue.  Hang tight!
I think the problem is in the newest patch. I've had the same problem since the latest patch. I've never had the same problem for 4 years.
